dcterms:creator: P. Sroka
P. Kryszkiewicz
A. Kliks
dcterms:description: A database that provides context information for dynamic frequency selection in V2X communications, particularly for vehicular platooning scenarios.
dcterms:title: Context Database (CDB)

dcterms:creator: P. Sroka
P. Kryszkiewicz
A. Kliks
dcterms:description: A map that provides information about the radio environment to support dynamic frequency selection in vehicular communications.
dcterms:title: Radio Environment Map (REM)

dcterms:creator: P. Sroka
P. Kryszkiewicz
A. Kliks
dcterms:description: Signals used for digital terrestrial television broadcasting, which are considered in the context of protecting primary services during dynamic frequency selection.
dcterms:title: DTT (Digital Terrestrial Television) signals

dcterms:creator: P. Sroka
P. Kryszkiewicz
A. Kliks
dcterms:description: Parameters used in simulations to evaluate the performance of dynamic frequency selection algorithms in vehicular communications.
dcterms:title: Simulation parameters

dcterms:creator: P. Sroka
P. Kryszkiewicz
A. Kliks
dcterms:description: Data related to traffic patterns and behaviors on motorways, used to simulate vehicular platooning scenarios.
dcterms:title: Traffic data for motorway simulations
